title: Store
body: My LOL store will not work and I have tried everything on the LOL help page its just a black screen,im using a mac and if anyone could help me thatd be great, or log into my account and buy Ahri for me lol.

replies.body: Is this happening in the Beta Client or Legacy client? Additionally, have you tried all the steps inside our [Store Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202536660#section-mac)? I definitely recommend giving them a go since they commonly resolve these sorts of issues.
